item.title: Funtra - Privacy Policy
item.description: Funtra Games Privacy Policy Last updated: June 8, 2022 This privacy policy (“Privacy Policy”) explains how we, Funtra Games Ltd. (“Funtra Games”, “we”, “us”, “our”) collect, use, share and otherwise process Personal Data in connection with your use of our mobile application and website (“App” and “Services”). When we refer to “Personal Data” in this Privacy Policy, we mean data which relates to an identified or reasonably identifiable individual.
